member.name: ILanguageExceptionStackBackTrace.GetStackBackTrace
member.param: The maximum number of frames to capture.
An array containing the stack back trace; the maximum size is the maxFramesToCapture.
On success, contains a pointer to the number of frames actually captured.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ILanguageExceptionStackBackTrace
member.summary: Allows projections to provide custom stack trace for that exception.
